content.question: A common scholarly interpretation of Nam June Paikâ€™s work Electronic Superhighway is that the United States

choices.label: cannot reconcile cultural differences between states
is in the habit of using antiquated technology
is united more by electronic mass media than by roads
should promote books to combat too much television consumption

content.answer: is united more by electronic mass media than by roads

topic.text: 10.4: Theories and Interpretations of Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
